task_description:
# Mobile-Responsive Design

Optimize the full UI for mobile devices. Ensure scoring, templates, and thread builder work seamlessly on phones.

## Rationale
Many creators work on mobile, especially for quick tweets. Mobile support expands the addressable market significantly.

## User Stories
- As a creator, I want to score tweets on my phone so that I can optimize on the go
- As a mobile user, I want a touch-friendly UI so that I can navigate easily

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] All features work on mobile browsers
- [ ] Touch-friendly interface elements
- [ ] Optimized for portrait and landscape
- [ ] Performance optimized for mobile networks

patterns.tailwind_v4_config: Uses @theme inline {} in index.css, NOT tailwind.config.js
patterns.cva_pattern: Class Variance Authority for component size variants
patterns.mobile_first: Unprefixed utilities for mobile, md:/lg: for larger screens
patterns.touch_feedback: Add active: states alongside hover: states

existing_implementations.description: Found existing responsive patterns in TemplateGrid using md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3, but most components are desktop-optimized only
